94f55ea9-aeca-4518-816f-ef54e79600cf.description: In this challenge students utilize their acquired knowledge to modify an existing Active Directory Forest by installing a supporting domain controller in an Active Directory Site infrastructure simulating a routed wide area network of their own design. Additionally, DDNS infrastructure consisting of Primary and replicated Secondary zones were implemented by the students to support the expanded infrastructure.
94f55ea9-aeca-4518-816f-ef54e79600cf.name: Active Directory Challenge: Domain Deployment and DNS Infrastructure

badge_template_activities.title: In this challenge students utilize their acquired knowledge to modify an existing Active Directory Forest by installing a supporting domain controller in an Active Directory Site infrastructure simulating a routed wide area network of their own design. Additionally, DDNS infrastructure consisting of Primary and replicated Secondary zones were implemented by the students to support the expanded infrastructure.

9aa56aeb-c7f8-4eb7-819d-e641ad669128.description: In this challenge, students utilize the skills they learned in C# to build a desktop application. The application is a workflow to get input from end user from multiple forms and submit data to SQL server. Entity frameworks are used to handle all the db transactions.
9aa56aeb-c7f8-4eb7-819d-e641ad669128.name: C# Challenge: Building an end-to-end application

badge_template_activities.title: In this challenge, students utilize the skills they learned in C# to build a desktop application. The application is a workflow to get input from end user from multiple forms and submit data to SQL server. Entity frameworks are used to handle all the db transactions.

b4dac02d-f3b1-4189-b961-6f4ace272580.description: In this challenge, students utilize their skills learned in ASP.NET MVC to build a website using .NET5.0. It includes features like authentication and database handling using EF core. The website has front end design using Bootstraps.
b4dac02d-f3b1-4189-b961-6f4ace272580.name: ASP.NET MVC Core Challenge: Building an end-to-end web application

badge_template_activities.title: In this challenge, students utilize their skills learned in ASP.NET MVC to build a website using .NET5.0. It includes features like authentication and database handling using EF core. The website has front end design using Bootstraps.

41e81a13-24c0-4cd4-8e88-4a28d9057f7f.description: In this challenge, students utilize their skills learned in Windows Server and Azure Administration to manage both on-premises and Azure hosted solutions centrally. It includes features like authentication, access control, administration of virtualize solutions in a hybrid environment with the use of graphical based administrative tools and command line using the Azure Portal, Server Manager, Windows Admin Center, and PowerShell.
41e81a13-24c0-4cd4-8e88-4a28d9057f7f.name: Windows Hybrid Administration Core Challenge: Administering Windows Server and Azure Infrastructure as a Service Compute

badge_template_activities.title: In this challenge, students utilize features like authentication, access control, administration of virtualize solutions in a hybrid environment with the use of graphical based administrative tools and command line using the Azure Portal, Server Manager, Windows Admin Center, and PowerShell. The administration required management and control of both on-premises and Azure hosted compute resources such as virtual machines and containers for application and service management.

b6192c55-25e4-49a5-a633-483bd961b20a.description: United Training partnered with The WIT Network for WIT members to participate. Over the course of a 6 week cohort program, participants learned high level cloud computing and the importance of building a multi-cloud structure. This program focused on cloud concepts that can be applied to the Big 3 cloud computing platforms of Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, and the Google Cloud platform. United Training In partnership with CompTIA and AWS is very proud of this delivery!
b6192c55-25e4-49a5-a633-483bd961b20a.name: Multi-Cloud Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: This program will look at cloud computing concepts that can be applied to the Big 3 cloud computing platforms of Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, and the Google Cloud platform.

12d1551f-8a57-468e-aab1-8a1e77fdc7fa.description: In this challenge, students are in charge of identity security at their organizations. After review of current configuration, the decision has been made to implement some changes. To better secure the environment students will implement changes in Azure Active Directory. Using Privileged Identity Management, Smart-Lockout, Conditional Access control and Azure AD Identity Protection, students will prove their ability to increase security around the identity control plane.
12d1551f-8a57-468e-aab1-8a1e77fdc7fa.name: Cybersecurity Challenge: Authentication and Access Management

badge_template_activities.title: In this challenge, students are in charge of identity security at their organizations. After review of current configuration, the decision has been made to implement some changes. To better secure the environment students will implement changes in Azure Active Directory. Using Privileged Identity Management, Smart-Lockout, Conditional Access control and Azure AD Identity Protection, students will prove their ability to increase security around the identity control plane.
